case_circumstances: The victim was found floating in the surplus canal, He had a wire around his neck.  He had been in the canal for several months.
case_head_hair: Dark Brown Hair, medium length, with moderate graying on sides and back
case_body_hair: Black/dark brown; abundant over torso and back
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: The body was observed to be wearing levis ,a heavy coat with fleece lining, a vertically striped brown and white shirt with a western design, jockey shorts, and long wool socks.
case_jewelry: The victim was wearing a Seiko Digital wrist watch silver in color.  The watch was an hour fast from the orginal time and was still working.  The watch was made in 1980.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
